specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Performance Windproof Windproof is a function that blocks wind from passing through and helps retain body heat. Water Repellent (Life) Water repellent(the resistance of fabrics to wetting by water) for life water repellent level Recommended Use Activewear, Windbreakers
